values: （X射线、超声波、电磁波等）扫描；（用扫描设备）扫描（文档、图像等）；搜索（频率、信号等）；用雷达或其他电子设备探测；浏览；翻阅；审视；细看；端详；检查；用光束扫描；标出诗的格律
扫描；浏览；细查；扫描图像；医疗成像；诊断扫描；胎儿扫描检查；快速查阅

synonym.mean: 扫描；浏览；细看；详细调查；标出格律

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 扫描的；观测的；搜索的；扫掠的
[计] 扫描仪；扫描器；光电子扫描装置

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指贪婪地读，暗含对某些作者或作品迷恋之义。
最普通用词，含义广泛。既指朗读又可指默读。
指快速扫视文章等以抓住其要旨。
最普通用词，可指粗略地查看，也可指仔细观察或调查以确定事物的性质、功能、特点等。
原义是仔细地检查分析，现用于指细看或浏览。
侧重按一定质量标准检查某物，找出不足或不同之处。
指为发现事实真相或了解掌握情况而进行深入细致的现场考察。

word_group.brief_definition: 计算机化X射线轴向分层造影扫描图
行扫描；线路扫描；直线扫描
脑扫描；大脑扫描；脑部扫描
扫描类型；扫描式；扫描方式

bilingual.source: Scan the email and write the places on the map.
bilingual.target: 扫描邮件并在地图上写下这些地方。

bilingual.source: Please scan the bar code on the item.
bilingual.target: 请扫描商品上的条形码。

bilingual.source: She used her phone to scan the QR code.
bilingual.target: 她用手机扫描了二维码。

bilingual.source: Can you scan the barcode for me?
bilingual.target: 你能帮我扫描一下这个条形码吗？

bilingual.source: Please scan your ticket at the entrance.
bilingual.target: 请在入口处扫描你的票。

bilingual.source: I used my phone to scan this QR code.
bilingual.target: 我用手机扫描了这张二维码。

bilingual.source: Please scan the document and send it to me.
bilingual.target: 请将文件扫描并发送给我。

bilingual.source: You should run an antivirus scan regularly.
bilingual.target: 你应该定期运行杀毒软件扫描。

bilingual.source: Scan the upc to get the product details.
bilingual.target: 扫描通用产品代码以获取产品详情。

bilingual.source: Airport security uses x-rays to scan luggage.
bilingual.target: 机场安检使用X射线扫描行李。

list.abstract: scan是英文单词，有细看、审视等含义，也是软件名称。

yingyinNormal.en: I'd love to see a scan of your brain sometime.
yingyinNormal.zh: 希望改日能看看你的脑扫描。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. Alright. Big moment here. Scan me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，到此为止，这是个重要的时刻，给我扫描。

yingyinNormal.en: The scan data from Snap's reconnaissance flight confirms Finn's report.
yingyinNormal.zh: 斯纳普的侦察飞行器传来的扫描数据证实了芬恩的报告。

yingyinNormal.en: I will scan you for injury. Don't scan me. Scan complete. Unbelievable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 让我为你扫描，看是否受伤。别扫我。扫描完毕。不可理喻。

yingyinNormal.en: Your scan data will be very helpful to my research. You have a remarkable brain.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的扫描资料会对我的研究非常有帮助，你有一颗非比寻常的大脑。

yingyinNormal.en: Got it. I'll scan the whole city at the same time. I just have to upgrade Baymax's sensor.
yingyinNormal.zh: 知道了，我可以扫描整个城市，只要升级大白的传感器就行。

yingyinNormal.en: Seriously, you have got to let me scan your brain when you're being dishonest so I can see what lights up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是说认真的，你得让我扫描你大脑看看你撒谎时哪些区域会亮起。

yingyinNormal.en: Hit that button, scan for Pods. Just about every 10 steps. Yeah, that doesn't even show the new ones. So, we can't go anywhere in the streets.
yingyinNormal.zh: 按那个按钮，扫描陷阱，大概十步就有一个，而且还没显示新安装的，所以我们哪儿都去不了。

yingyinNormal.en: He was relaxed and loose and calm. Well, Sheldon's a complicated man. He said "Whatev." Give him a brain scan that might be a tumor.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢尔顿是个复杂的男人。他很放松而且散漫且平静。他说了"无所"。带他去做大脑扫描可能长瘤了。

yingyinNormal.en: And if you disagree, I'd recommend you have a cat scan to look for a tumor pressing on the cognitive processing centers of your brain.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你不同意，我建议你去做一个X光断层扫描，看看是不是有肿瘤压迫到了你大脑的认知处理单元。

yingyinNormal.en: I know you erased my password, probably deleted my retinal scan, but if you want to stay ahead of me, Mr. Secretary. You need to keep both eyes open.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道你会清除我的密码，会删掉视网膜扫描记录，不过，你要是想玩儿过我，部长先生，那你得把两只眼睛都睁大点儿。

yingyinNormal.en: Cause they'll just let the NSA scan your digital ghost and they'll tell you who your roommate is based on everything you've ever said, written or clicked.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们只要请国家安全局扫描一下你的电子数据库，就可以给你分配好室友，这电子数据库记录了所有你说过的，写过的，点击过的。

yingyinNormal.en: The Aquascum is programmed to scan your tank environment every five minutes. Scan? What does that mean?
yingyinNormal.zh: 水得清设定为每五分钟扫瞄一次你的鱼缸。扫瞄?那是什么意思？

yingyinNormal.en: Yes. I can use the data from your scan to find him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 太棒了，我可以用你检测到的数据来找他了。

yingyinNormal.en: You'd have to scan everyone in San Fransokyo and that might take, I don't know, forever?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你要在旧京山检测所有人，这也许要花上一辈子的时间。

yingyinNormal.en: Scan said you didn't look like you on the inside. Miles off your baseline. Do you know what that means? I found the kid.
yingyinNormal.zh: 测试结果表明你很不在状态啊。偏离基准线太远。你应该知道这意味着什么吧？我找到了那个孩子了。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 略读; 浏览; 翻阅

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 扫描；细看；浏览；扫略；（scan的现在分词）

word_family.mean: v. 细看；审视；标出诗的格律；读出诗的韵律；浏览；电视扫描；粗略看；扫描检查；用（光束）扫描；计算机扫描

examination_example.sentence: Specific brain regions that respond during direct gaze are being explored by other researches, using advanced methods of brain <highlight>scanning</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其他研究正在利用先进的脑部扫描方法，探索在直视时作出反应的特定脑部区域。

examination_example.sentence: According to brain-<highlight>scan</highlight> experiments, the demands of so much decision-making quickly become too much for us.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据脑部扫描实验，如此多的决策要求很快就会令我们难以承受。

sense_info_list.en: look quickly but not very carefully at a document, or others
sense_info_list.zh: 略读; 浏览; 翻阅

examination_example.sentence: At night, <highlight>scan</highlight> the horizon for artificial light sources, such as fires and streetlights, then walk toward the glow of light pollution.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在晚上，仔细眺望地平线，找寻人造光源，比如火和街灯，然后朝发光的光污染方向走去。

word_usage.usage: scan作动词时，既可作及物动词，又可作不及物动词。作及物动词时，其后可接名词或代词，如：scan the list of names，；也可用于被动结构

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 细看；审视；标出诗的格律；读出诗的韵律；浏览；电视扫描；粗略看；扫描检查；用（光束）扫描；计算机扫描

examination_example.sentence: She's using CT <highlight>scans</highlight> to measure muscle size and fat, and comparing seniors on a high-protein diet with those on regular diets.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她正在使用CT扫描来测量肌肉大小和脂肪，并将高蛋白饮食的老年人与常规饮食的老年人进行比较。

examination_example.sentence: Now a company in Massachusetts says that by using magnetic brain <highlight>scans</highlight> they can determine with 97% accuracy whether someone is telling the truth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在，马萨诸塞州的一家公司表示，通过使用脑部磁扫描，他们可以以97%的准确率确定某人是否在说真话。

examination_example.sentence: Scientists <highlight>scanning</highlight> and mapping the Giza pyramids say they've discovered that Great Pyramid of Giza is not exactly even. But really not by much.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那些扫描和绘制吉萨(Giza )金字塔的科学家们表示，他们发现胡夫金字塔(Great Pyramid of Giza)并不完全对称，但是(差距)微乎其微。

sense_info_list.en: a medical test in which a machine produces a picture of the inside of a person's body on a computer screen after taking X-rays

examination_example.sentence: Neuroscientists, on the other hand, armed with brain <highlight>scans</highlight> and EEGs (脑电图), have not been subject to the same degree of critique.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一方面，拥有大脑扫描和脑电图的神经科学家则没有受到同样程度的批评。

sense_info_list.en: look quickly but not very carefully at a document, or others

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Scan</highlight> the highlights of this year's Consumer Electronics Show (CES), and you may get a slight feeling of having seen them before.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 浏览一下今年消费电子产品展（CES）的亮点，你可能会有一种以前看过的感觉。

sense_info_list.en: look at every part of something carefully, especially because you are looking for a particular thing or person

examination_example.sentence: The card reader failed to do the <highlight>scanning</highlight>.
The store's card reader failed to <highlight>scan</highlight> the card's magnetic strip.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 商店的读卡器无法扫描卡的磁条。

sense_info_list.en: look quickly but not very carefully at a document; or others

examination_example.sentence: The market is growing for biometric (生物测量) technologies–like fingerprint <highlight>scans</highlight>–to keep others out of private e-spaces.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 生物识别技术（如指纹扫描）的市场正在增长，以防止其他人进入私人电子空间。

examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们只是扫描他们的手。

examination_example.sentence: Their hand <highlight>scan</highlight> is connected to their bank cards, so they can pay successfully.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的手扫和他们的银行卡相连，所以他们可以成功支付。

examination_example.sentence: They can <highlight>scan</highlight> the QR code to buy the books.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们可以扫描二维码来买书。
